$writer_pool_size_desc.en: The size of writer worker process pool. The default value 0 means to use the number of Erlang schedulers. Greater number means it can perform more writer work concurrently.

$data_retention_desc.en: The retention period of fanout data. The default value is 7d.

$gc_interval_desc.en: The interval between garbage collection runs. The default value is 1h. If this config is updated on the fly, an immediate garbage collection will be triggered, followed by a new timer with the new interval.

$reader_batch_size_desc.en: The number of messages to read in each batch. The default value is 5. A larger batch size means less communication between nodes, but also higher latency. It should not be too large, otherwise it may fill the MQTT message flight window and increase the latency of other subscriptions.
